files.name: main.py
files.content:
def addNumbers ( x, y ):
    return x + y
  
def multiplyNumbers ( x, y ):
    return x * y 


while ( True ):
  
  firstNum = int( input( "Enter a number (0 to exit): " )) 
  
  if ( firstNum == 0 ): break
  
  secondNum = int( input( "Enter another number: " ))

  sumTotal = addNumbers ( firstNum, secondNum )
  multiplyTotal = multiplyNumbers ( firstNum, secondNum )

  print ( firstNum, "+", secondNum, "=", sumTotal )
  print ( firstNum, "*", secondNum, "=", multiplyTotal )
  
  
print ( "All Done." )
